body:
Looking for something great to watch today?

For unlimited access and viewing, download the app on your Android device now - https://t.co/hPUajCBWIL. https://t.co/UU5Dw9k4vq

The 4th Industrial Revolution is creating new categories of jobs and wholly displacing others.

How can policy-makers and business prepare workers and markets for both old and new occupations?

Watch the @wef discussion on the Nile Media App at 20h41 https://t.co/hPUajCTy7l. https://t.co/gP8GlvU646

Download The Nile Media App to watch the documentary at 15h00, with repeats at 19h00 and 23h00 - https://t.co/hPUajCTy7l.

Is Workers' Day worth celebrating with SA's high unemployment rate?

The public was asked whether it feels enough is being done to address the unemployment crisis, challenge worker issues and champion the class struggle.

Watch the doccie on the Nile Media App at 15h00. #MayDay https://t.co/M7Qu0pzeVD

Download The Nile Media App to watch the documentary at 15h00 -  https://t.co/hPUajCTy7l.

Is Workers' Day worth celebrating with SA's high unemployment rate?

The public was asked whether they feel enough is being done to address the unemployment crisis, challenge worker issues and champion the class struggle.

As part of the Workers' Day celebrations and commemoration, Nile Media will be airing documentaries that explore the history and significance of the public holiday; as well as the current state of the Workers' Struggle.
